result.arabic_text: فَإِن كَذَّبُوكَ فَقُل رَّبُّكُمۡ ذُو رَحۡمَةٖ وَٰسِعَةٖ وَلَا يُرَدُّ بَأۡسُهُۥ عَنِ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمِينَ
result.translation: 147. Nabiyow yahuud kee korosuk koo cina mari koo dirabboysek, toysa sin Rabbi farakkale Racmatle Rabbi kinniih kay digaala temeete tet tekkek umeyniitih yan marak tet gacissam matana keenik ixxic.
